5 GOSUB900
10 DH=36399:DL=36400
15 POKEDL,60
20 A$=INKEY$:IFA$=""THEN10
25 EXEC
30 GOTO20
900 A=36352:I=0
905 READV
910 IFV=-1THENEXECA:RETURN
915 POKEA+I,V
920 I=I+1
925 GOTO905

1005 DATA206,0,60,255,142,47,182,142

1030 DATA0
